column5: Hey all I was wondering if anyone has used the BPS line of on board chargers?  I bought the XPS i series 5/5/5 three bank charger it has a 2 year warranty I picked it up before asking as the sale is over this week and I might not get to the store before the sale ends Just wondering what otehrs here have had with there XPS series chargers.  thanks Mike
I have the same model.  2 years now and going strong..  Sherriff
Same here, 2 seasons, going strong. Works great
I've had a 10A single bank XPS on-board charger for at least 4 or 5 years now and it works great.
Thanks guys I was reading some on the BPS site and they were split it seems some had no luck I hope to have it mounted and ready for the weekend.
That's a great choice Mr.EH. you won't regret it.
